summary: This makes all Argonian hairstyles HD
descriptionHtml:
IMPORTANT!!!

You should read this...
These textures could not be made without the feather texture i got permission to use from the good KrittaKitty
So all credit for that goes to her :) .
http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/users/4930906/?

[u]UPDATE[/u]

[b]Upcoming[/b]

Im making a new version that in my eyes looks more like the original.
I have not made a release date yet
[img]http://www.mediafire.com/convkey/29ce/l2hsob99pdsxlimzg.jpg[/img]



[u]UPDATE[/u]

23-03-2016

HD Argonian hairstyles 2.0 is released
also a few new files/patches and by patches i do not mean for other mods, I will upload some pictures later, but you guys out there are welcome to upload some :) .


[u]UPDATE[/u]

Okay sometime ago i got a request by nexus user [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/users/545796]Korpens Natten[/url]
About make a more weathered/rougher look to the horns, and asked me if i could do something like jacksons chameleon version, well that turn out to be a little harder to do, so I tried something else and here it is. May I present HD argonian hairstyles update 2.0

Will be released this month
[img]http://www.mediafire.com/convkey/6cfb/zjd5cbrslk3z9xczg.jpg[/img]

So its time for my ultimate texture, i presents to you
The HD Argonian Hairstyles

This is for both male and female argonians, so everyone can be happy :D

It changes almost everything from the original texture (except scales)
And the Diffuse is upgraded from 1024x1024 to 2048x2048 and the same with the normal map and specular map.
(You can see a picture of the diffuse texture in the images section)

I uploaded a lot of images but you are very welcome to upload some if you want too.
(Also i didnt make pictures of all hairstyles only those i think is most important) 


IMPORTANT!!! Again.... :)

Keep in mind that the pictures you see i use Realvision enb combined with skylight enb Climates of tamriel and Enhanced light and FX and Ultra realistic world light.

Also Checkout my other mods

author: Blackwolf24 and KrittaKitty
